mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO IBIMS112B ( CNSB_DCD , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR , SN , DEAL_NO , MTR_DCD , JDGM_DCD , RGST_DT , DEL_YN , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES
( #{item.cnsbDcd} , #{item.sn} , #{item.rsltnYr} , #{index}+1 , #{item.dealNo} , #{item.mtrDcd} , #{item.jdgmDcd} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{item.hndEmpno} , #{item.hndTmnlNo} , #{item.hndTrId} , #{item.guid} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.DEAL_NO , A.SN , B.MTR_NM , A.JDGM_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R014' AND CD_VL_ID = A.JDGM_DCD ) AS JDGM_DCD_NM , A.MTR_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'L007' AND CD_VL_ID = A.MTR_DCD ) AS MTR_DCD_NM , B.DPRT_CD , ( SELECT MAX(DPRT_NM) FROM IBIMS003B WHERE DPRT_CD = B.DPRT_CD ) AS DPRT_NM , B.CHRG_P_ENO , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRG_P_ENO ) AS CHRG_P_ENM , B.OWN_P_ENO , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.OWN_P_ENO ) AS OWN_P_ENM FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT OUTER JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{sn} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND B.LAST_YN = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS112B WHERE 1=1 AND CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND CNSB_SQ = #{sn} AND RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CNSB_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I008' AND CD_VL_ID = A.CNSB_DCD ) AS CNSB_DCD_NM , A.RSLTN_YR , A.CNSB_SQ , A.SN , A.DEAL_NO , A.MTR_DCD , A.JDGM_DCD , B.MTR_NM , CONCAT(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD ),' (', B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD, ')') AS PTFD_CRNCY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT , C.CNSB_OPN_DT , C.CNSB_OPN_TM , CONCAT(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D010' AND CD_VL_ID = B.DPRT_CD ), ' (', B.DPRT_CD , ')') AS DPRT_NM , CONCAT(( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRG_P_ENO ), ' (', B.CHRG_P_ENO, ')') AS CHRG_P_ENM , CONCAT(( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.OWN_P_ENO ), ' (', B.OWN_P_ENO, ')') AS OWN_P_ENM , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS111B C ON A.CNSB_DCD = C.CNSB_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = C.SN AND A.RSLTN_YR = C.RSLTN_YR WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD >= 304

SELECT B.DEAL_NO , B.MTR_NM , B.MTR_DCD , B.JDGM_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R014' AND CD_VL_ID = B.JDGM_DCD ) AS JDGM_DCD_NM , B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD , CONCAT(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD ),' (', B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD, ')') AS PTFD_CRNCY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD , CASE WHEN B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '304' THEN '' ELSE ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) END AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM , IFNULL(A.APVL_AMT, '') AS APVL_AMT , IFNULL(A.SDN_CNDT_F, '') AS SDN_CNDT_F , IFNULL(A.SDN_CNDT_CTNS, '') AS SDN_CNDT_CTNS , IFNULL(A.ETC_CNDT_F, '') AS ETC_CNDT_F , IFNULL(A.ETC_CNDT_CTNS, '') AS ETC_CNDT_CTNS , B.RISK_RCG_NO , C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , IFNULL(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R025' AND CD_VL_ID = C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD ), '') AS RSLTN_RSLT_CD_NM , A.SN , A.CNSB_DCD , A.CNSB_SQ FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '307' THEN '4' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '308' THEN '2' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '309' AND ETC_CNDT_F = 'N' THEN '1' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '309' AND ETC_CNDT_F = 'Y' THEN '3' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '306' THEN '5' ELSE '' END AS RSLTN_RSLT_CD , CNSB_DCD , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR , SN FROM IBIMS112B ) C ON A.CNSB_DCD = C.CNSB_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = C.CNSB_SQ AND A.RSLTN_YR = C.RSLTN_YR AND A.SN = C.SN WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND A.SN = #{sn}

SELECT IBIMS112B.CNSB_DCD , IBIMS112B.CNSB_SQ , IBIMS112B.RSLTN_YR , IBIMS112B.SN , IBIMS112B.DEAL_NO , IBIMS112B.MTR_DCD , IBIMS112B.JDGM_DCD , IBIMS112B.RGST_DT , IBIMS112B.SDN_CNDT_F , IBIMS112B.SDN_CNDT_CTNS , IBIMS112B.ETC_CNDT_F , IBIMS112B.ETC_CNDT_CTNS , IBIMS112B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD , IBIMS112B.APVL_AMT , IBIMS112B.APVL_DT , IBIMS112B.DEL_YN , IBIMS112B.HND_DETL_DTM , IBIMS112B.HND_EMPNO , IBIMS112B.HND_TMNL_NO , IBIMS112B.HND_TR_ID , IBIMS112B.GUID , IBIMS103B.CHRG_P_ENO AS CHRG_P_ENO , A.EMP_NM AS CHRG_P_ENM , IBIMS103B.OWN_P_ENO AS OWN_P_ENO , B.EMP_NM AS OWN_P_ENM FROM IBIMS112B , IBIMS103B , IBIMS003B A , IBIMS003B B WHERE 1=1 AND IBIMS112B.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND IBIMS112B.MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd} AND IBIMS112B.JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} AND IBIMS112B.DEAL_NO = IBIMS103B.DEAL_NO AND IBIMS112B.MTR_DCD = IBIMS103B.MTR_DCD AND IBIMS112B.JDGM_DCD = IBIMS103B.JDGM_DCD AND IBIMS103B.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.EMPNO = IBIMS103B.CHRG_P_ENO AND B.EMPNO = IBIMS103B.OWN_P_ENO
